title: Federated Learning-Based Security Education for Protecting Medical IoT Data

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Learners are advanced domain experts with office/administrative backgrounds, progressing asynchronously through an LMS in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Explain the security mechanisms of federated learning in healthcare IoT environments and identify at least three data leakage risks
Implement the PAFL algorithm with an enhanced VGG16 architecture and noise adjustment techniques to achieve model accuracy above 90%
Apply encryption techniques that minimize gradient exposure risks in distributed learning environments to real-world scenarios
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
